name: Tavolga-12
description:
Hardcore tactical online first-person shooter

1. Wait when allowed one of four evacuation buildings
2. Activate evacuation capsules
3. Evacuate

The dying island is surrounded by a huge concrete wall, inside - an open world full of dangers, where everywhere you can find traces of the catastrophe and the people who left it. Explore, think over routes to your goal, manage to evacuate from the island in an escape pod.

Use the AI ​​robotic vehicles that fill the island to gain an advantage over other players. Distract players by activating mobile mines, rerouting combat vehicles, turning turret systems on and off.

Skillfully use the weapons that you have, incapacitating the enemy. Be aware of the ballistics of the bullet's flight and the lead when fired. Some shelters only seem strong - they can easily be pierced by a bullet from a powerful rifle. Save ammo - there are not many places on the island where you can replenish it. Don't forget sound masking.

Remember, there are many traps on the island that can kill you!

Remember that a frontal attack is almost always equal to suicide, calculate tactical moves and only then - GO!
